name: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars (Peanut Butter Jelly Wars)
name_original: Peanut Butter Jelly Wars (Peanut Butter Jelly Wars)
description:
For hundreds of years two great nations have been at war... Team Peanut Butter vs. Team Jelly!

Eliminate your opponent's jar of peanut butter or jelly by summoning ants, U.F.O.s, or explosive gnomes to attack! Defend yourself by placing walls of bread and cannons, but remember to also place piggy banks to improve your  economy. The  first player who gets their jar destroyed loses!

In Peanut Butter Jelly Wars you can:

  • Play with your friends via local couch multiplayer
  • Connect Xbox controllers to play (or customize keyboard controls to your liking)
  • Choose from a selection of 16 unique troops and buildings, with over 4,000 combinations to try
  • Discover a brand new and exciting subgenre of Real Time Strategy gameplay
  • Invent new strategies to prove who among your friends is the greatest war tactician
  • Host local tournaments in your community to create new friendships and rivalries

Download the demo for FREE until Dec. 4th, 2021 when first release comes out. In the first release there will be (in addition to what is already in the demo):

  • Single player arcade mode
  • A new stage

What to expect in future releases:

  • Free DLC
  • Playable on Mac (maybe Linux?)
  • Online multiplayer
  • Vs A.I. opponents in vs mode
  • Free for all matches with up to 4 players
  • Maybe more? (the more support we have the more we can do)

Discord: https://discord.gg/WDPUf5pX
